selected_skills.name: map_length_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: Map the calculated stretch of the rubber band to one of the multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the calculated stretch length as input to map it to the corresponding option label.

new_skill_specs.name: calculate_stretch_in_right_triangle
new_skill_specs.purpose: Calculate the new length of the rubber band when the midpoint is pulled up, forming two right triangles.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The new length of the rubber band.
edge_cases: If the vertical displacement is zero, the new length should equal the original length.
